definition[0]: a rank or level of authority in an organization, business etc, or the people at that level
example[1]: Their clients are drawn from the highest echelons of society.
definition[1]: a line of ships, soldiers, planes etc arranged in a pattern that looks like a series of steps
definition[2]: a rank or level of responsibility within an organization, group of businesses etc, or a person at that level
example[2]: those in the highest echelons of management
example[3]: The banking system normally helps allocate money to the lower echelon but at the moment there is a credit squeeze.
